about_the_game:
Can you escape from this cursed mansion?
A curse that has been deciding the fate of a family for generations...
A decaying mansion...

Caroline's ghost strikes NOW!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This is a first-person survival horror game.

You've been asked by your friend Inspector Oliver to investigate a mansion on a hilltop where strange deaths continue.
The mansion, which has been uninhabited for a long time, has an eerie atmosphere.
As you stepped into the mansion, you heard a strange voice.
"I found you... "
Immediately after, the door slams shut with vigor and you are trapped.

■ Explore the mansion!
As you explore the mansion, you'll find various notes and books left by the inhabitants who lived here.
There are clues that will help you solve the mystery of this mansion and escape from it.
Why is this house cursed? How do you break a curse?
Unravel the mysteries with your own hands.


■ Find the curse statue!
There are several idols hidden in the mansion, which are the key to the curse.
Walk around the nooks and crannies of the mansion and seek them out.
However, if you bring them out...

■ Run away from the ghost
The mansion is inhabited by a ghost called Caroline.
She appears out of nowhere as you bring out the cursed statue and relentlessly pursues you.
In order to escape the chase and destroy the cursed statue, you need to grasp the structure of the mansion and take the best route to escape.
Can you get away from her?

■ The truth of the curse
As the story progresses, you get closer and closer to the truth about the mansion.
Why did Caroline become a ghost? What is the underlying presence of the power of the curse?
And... will you be able to leave this house in one piece?

As the story progresses, you get closer to the truth of the mansion.
Why did Caroline become a ghost? What is the basis of the power of the curse?
And ... can you leave this mansion safely?
